price: 10 Attends donc le jour où, du ciel, viendra une fumée bien visible
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
